field.name: mosaic_item_title
field.label: Title
field.description: The title to be used for the Mosaic item. If not set, it will default to the article title.

field.name: mosaic_item_description
field.label: Description
field.description: The description to be used for the Feature. If not set, it will defaults to the article Introtext.

field.name: mosaic_item_image
field.label: Image
field.description: The image to be used assigned to the article for the Mosaic items.

field.name: mosaic_item_link
field.label: Link
field.description: If set, the link will show a 'Read More' button, link the title and based on the Theme, link the image as well.

field.name: mosaic_item_tags
field.label: Tags
field.description: A comma separated list of tags for the filtering on frontend.
